author: vajahath
body:
## Summary of the new feature/enhancement
As a user, I wish if powershell was able automatically update to latest stable version along with windows update or some sort of other mechanism.

## Proposed technical implementation details
* Along with Windows updates.
* Or, like how Chrome updates behind the scenes.
